body: Need more daughter and father action at home
Hot damn the art is good.
10/10 good multi work dont forgot to check all his work
The anime is such a piece of shit comparated to the manga.
Is this really multiwork? Where is part 1?

I was on sankaku and some guys were saying the anime does not do Yoshiron art style justice. It's so true. The shading and line work are phenomenal. 

10/10 will fap again. 
Plus I love some father daughter action
I would upvote you if I could Troncol, because damn that was some deep shit analysis.

Both the father and Daughter were damaged in this one. The father from being left by his wife, and the Daughter from the result of the father's actions. While I feel some sympathy regarding the shock of his wife running away with another man, I still condemn him for what he did to his daughter. Sadly while the Teacher was able to stop the abuse it was a little to late to save the daughter... Poor girl. After constant sexual abuse of her father, her mind got (if not broken) altered/conditioned to the point where she most likely will never be able to live a "normal" life. My heart goes for the daughter in this one seeing as she was the victim in this twice around. The first for losing her mother to another man, and the second due to her damaged father's actions.
Would've loved to see the teacher get some action too.
